feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: v. 7.0.14 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.0.14 is available. Fixed bug in check update function

entry.title: v. 7.0.10 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.0.10 is available. New features (add subjects to modifiers, ethogram sorting) and some bugs fixed
